name: Senior Vue Developer
description:
Our client is an innovative company on the intersection of the highly-competitive automotive industry and modern software development. Their applications help the industry improve its cost-efficiency. Through the use of data science, mathematics and computational geometry they reshape product costing, purchasing and engineering.

Tasks:

  • Develop a SaaS frontend in Typescript using Vue.js
  • Be part of a cross-functional team including product, design, quality and development
  • Implement new features as well as end user feedback
  • Build up and maintain a design system
  • Define/specify and roll out coding guidelines and patterns
  • Stay up to date with the latest technologies without being afraid of sharing your findings

Must-have skills:

  • 7+ years of experience with Vue.js and TypeScript
  • Focus on Design, clean Markup as well as some experience having used CSS in your previous projects and enthusiasm for user experience design
  • Experience with writing clean and maintainable code
  • Ability to understand and debug existing implementations
  • Fluent English

Nice-to-have skills:

  • 3D Web Visualization with web technologies
  • Test-Driven-Development
  • d3.js, Nuxt, Webpack, Git, Docker, yarn, axios

Benefits:

  • A high-impact role in a fast-growing environment with a clear product vision, a flat hierarchy and regular customer contact
  • Fun events, tasty coffee & snacks, team lunches and an optional German course
  • Additional vacation days - for your birthday, Christmas, Easter and all the Bridge days (Fenstertage)
  • A growing team of currently about 45 highly motivated colleagues from various disciplines
  • An office next to a park in the center of the most liveable city in the world
  • Relocation package to Austria if needed
  • A remote option (for those who have a visa-free entry to Austria only, so you could attend a team meeting once in a while with no problem)
